required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study Evaluating Safety and Efficacy of CAR-T Cells Targeting CD123 in Patients With Acute Leukemia
clinical_study.official_title: Study Evaluating Safety and Efficacy of CAR-T Cells Targeting CD123 in Patients With Acute Leukemia

lead_sponsor.agency: Second Affiliated Hospital of Xi'an Jiaotong University

clinical_study.source: Second Affiliated Hospital of Xi'an Jiaotong University

brief_summary.textblock: This is a single arm, open-label, phase 1 study, to determine the safety and efficacy of anti-CD123 CAR-T cells in treating patients diagnosed with refractory/relapsed acute leukemia in a dose-escalation way.

detailed_description.textblock: This is a dose-escalation study of autologous anti-CD123 CAR-T cells. Patients receive fludarabine phosphate(300 mg/m^2) and cyclophosphamide (30 mg/m^2) IV on days -5 to -3, and then Patients receive autologous anti-CD123 CAR T cells IV over 20 minutes on day 0 (20% of total dose), day2 (30% of total dose) and day6 (50% of total dose, according to the side-effects occured). The total dose of CAR-T cells used in dose-escalation study is 0.5x10^6- 2.0x10^6 CAR-T cells/kg.

primary_outcome.description: assessed by the National Cancer Institute (NCI) Common Terminology Criteria for Adverse Events (CTCAE) version 4.0

intervention.description: Patients receive fludarabine phosphate(300 mg/m^2) and cyclophosphamide (30 mg/m^2) IV on days -5 to -3, and then Patients receive autologous anti-CD123 CAR T cells IV over 20 minutes on day 0 (20% of total dose), day2 (30% of total dose) and day6 (50% of total dose, according to the side-effects occured). The total dose of CAR-T cells used in dose-escalation study is 0.5x10^6- 2.0x10^6 CAR-T cells/kg.

overall_official.affiliation: Second Affiliated Hospital of Xi'an Jiaotong University

facility.name: Second Affiliated Hospital of Xi'an Jiaotong University
